channel.title: Npc's facing a certain way
channel.description: Is there a way to spawn npc's to face a certain way? Like make one npc face north, and another face south, etc.? I've been looking around, but can't find anything. (yes, i've used google so...) I'm using an Allstar-scape v2 source if that matters at all.

item.title: Npc's facing a certain way
item.dc:creator: @KittenCake KittenCake
item.description:
@KittenCake wrote:

nope… still haven’t found a fix for it

Read full topic

item.title: Npc's facing a certain way
item.dc:creator: @bryan_m bryan m
item.description:
@bryan_m wrote:

yea there is you didnt see the tut that says this
you do this
from this

[code]makeGlobalObject(3222, 3438, 3218, 0, 10);[code/]
to this:

[code]makeGlobalObject(3222, 3438, 3218, 1, 10);[code/]

it works on anything like npc or bank or anything really enjoy from a guy its in the tut section. on second page.[/code][/code]

Read full topic
